file_content.text: It is a gift to be in the presence. I felt the Force--it travels below your skin, straight to the heart, the lungs, the gut. A warmth and a chill.
The Revan says it is the Force that feeds the Infinite Engine. We feed it with our thoughts.
Our love, our hatred, all that we feel, it turns to energy and nourishes us in return.
They say we once lived without the Engine, without the Revan. I do not wish to imagine such a life.
